hero.title: Invest in Agriculture with Guaranteed Returns
hero.subtitle: Join Akib Agro Farm's investment opportunities in sheep and kampung chicken farming. Transparent contracts, expert management, and guaranteed returns. Start your agricultural investment journey today.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Trusted Agricultural Investment Platform
about.description: Akib Agro Farm offers transparent agricultural investment opportunities in sheep and kampung chicken farming. With years of experience and proven track record, we provide investors with guaranteed returns through expert farm management and ethical practices.

feature1.title: Transparent Tracking
feature1.description: Monitor your investment in real-time with detailed dashboards and reports.

feature2.title: Guaranteed Returns
feature2.description: Clear contracts with guaranteed returns. No hidden fees or surprises.

feature3.title: Expert Management
feature3.description: Our experienced team manages every aspect of animal care, health, and farm operations.

investments.label: Investment Packages
investments.title: Choose Your Investment Package
investments.description: Select from our range of agricultural investment opportunities. Each package offers transparent terms, expert management, and guaranteed returns.

package1.name: Long-Term Sheep Investment
package1.description: 18-month investment with guaranteed 2 calves. Perfect for long-term agricultural investment.

package2.name: Sheep Qurban Project
package2.description: 6-month investment with 50/50 cost and profit sharing. Ideal for seasonal investment opportunities.

package3.name: Kampung Chicken Farming
package3.description: 4-month investment in premium kampung chicken farming. Fast returns with quality produce.

features.label: Platform Features

feature3.title: Animal Health Tracking

feature4.description: Receive instant notifications for investment milestones, health updates, and important contract information.

feature5.title: Mobile Optimized
feature5.description: Access your investment dashboard from any device, anywhere, anytime. Monitor your investments on the go.

feature6.title: Secure & Transparent
feature6.description: Your investment data is secure with enterprise-grade security. All contracts and returns are transparent and auditable.

step1.title: Choose Package
step1.description: Select from our investment packages: Long-Term Sheep, Qurban Project, or Kampung Chicken.

step2.title: Contact Us
step2.description: Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to discuss your investment and review contract terms.

step3.title: Sign Contract
step3.description: Review and sign the investment contract with clear terms, costs, and guaranteed returns.

step4.title: Track & Receive Returns
step4.description: Monitor your investment through our platform and receive guaranteed returns at contract completion.

testimonial1.text: Investing with Akib Agro Farm has been a great experience. The platform is transparent, contracts are clear, and I received my guaranteed returns on time. Highly recommended!
testimonial1.name: Ahmad Rahman

testimonial2.text: The Long-Term Sheep Investment package exceeded my expectations. The team kept me updated throughout the 18 months, and I received my 2 calves as guaranteed. Excellent service!
testimonial2.name: Siti Nurhaliza

testimonial3.text: I've invested in multiple packages and each one delivered as promised. The Qurban Project was particularly profitable with the 50/50 profit sharing. Professional and trustworthy.
testimonial3.name: Mohd Faizal

package1.title: Long-Term Sheep Investment
package1.subtitle: 18-month investment with guaranteed 2 calves. Perfect for long-term agricultural investment with transparent terms and expert management.

extension.title: Extension Option
extension.description: After the first 18 months, continue for another 18 months by only paying RM 500/sheep (for care and food).

specifications.title: Age & Weight Specifications
specifications.ageValue: Young adult sheep that has reached maturity breeding age: around 15 months for ewes and about 13 months for rams.
specifications.weightValue: For breeding purchase, a sheep around 12-18 months old and weighing 35-45 kg would be a reasonable guideline (depending on breed and condition).

mortality.title: Expected Mortality Rate
mortality.rate: For sheep generally under good management: about 5-10% mortality.

package2.title: Sheep Qurban Project
package2.subtitle: 6-month investment with 50/50 cost and profit sharing. Ideal for seasonal investment opportunities with transparent terms.

selling.title: Selling Price
selling.price: Average market price: RM 900-1,100 for ~30kg sheep

specifications.title: Age & Weight Specifications
specifications.ageValue: Aim to buy sheep that are already close to the sale/kurban weight to minimise risk and feeding time. In Malaysia sheep mature at 6-9 months for general maturity.
specifications.weightValue: If target weight is ~30 kg for sale, you'd likely purchase a sheep maybe 6-9 months old with a live weight maybe 20-30 kg (depending breed). This ensures that within the six-month period the sheep can reach the sale weight.

mortality.title: Expected Mortality Rate
mortality.rate: While your target is 5-10%, shorter intensive period projects may see lower or higher depending on management; use the 5-10% figure as a guideline.

package3.title: Kampung Chicken Farming
package3.subtitle: 4-month investment in premium kampung chicken farming. Fast returns with quality produce and transparent terms.

growth.title: Growth Information
growth.typeValue: Kampung chickens are slower-growing than commercial broilers.
growth.periodValue: They usually reach market weight (1.3 - 1.8 kg live weight) in about 90 - 120 days (3–4 months).
growth.qualityValue: The longer rearing period gives them firmer meat and better flavour — ideal for the premium local market.

mortality.title: Expected Mortality Rate
mortality.rate: Around 15 - 20% is typical for small-scale or semi-free-range kampung chicken farms, since they're less intensively managed than broilers.
